alert.note: Alert for Hall; Hamilton; Kearney; Merrick; Phelps; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:23PM CST until February 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch will be possible along with ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will result in patchy blowing snow. For the Wind Chill Advisory, dangerously cold wind chills are expected. Wind chills could reach as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight Wednesday night to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Hall; Hamilton; Kearney; Merrick; Phelps; Polk; York
